name: react-app
description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).

scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && concurrently "npm start" "npm run client"
scripts.production-build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy-aws: npm run production-build && npm install && npm start
